info.title: Electron App Driver Protocol
info.description: Protocol for driving an Electron app.

methods.name: triggerGlobalShortcut
methods.description: Trigger a global keyboard shortcut in the application

result.name: result
result.description: true if the shortcut was registered and triggered successfully

methods.name: enterText
methods.description: Enter text into the currently focused element

methods.name: sendKey
methods.description: Send a key event to the currently focused element

methods.name: resetApplication
methods.description: Reset the application to its initial state

methods.name: startupFinished
methods.description: Sent when the application has completed its startup process

methods.name: windowShown
methods.description: Sent when a browser window becomes visible

params.name: page
params.description: The name of the HTML file being displayed in the window

methods.name: enterTextDone
methods.description: Sent when text entry triggered by the enterText method has been completed

method.name: Method
method.description: Methods that are sent from the client to the Electron app.

notification.name: Notification
notification.description: Notifications sent from the Electron app to the client.
